eu.dety.burp.joseph.attacks

Interface IAttackInfo

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KeyConfusionInfo, SignatureExclusionInfo

    public interface IAttackInfo
    Interface defining necessary methods for attack info classes

      • prepareAttack

        IAttack prepareAttack(burp.IBurpExtenderCallbacks callbacks,
                    burp.IHttpRequestResponse requestResponse,
                    burp.IRequestInfo requestInfo,
                    burp.IParameter parameter)
                      throws AttackPreparationFailedException
        Prepare the attack by loading all necessary parameter
        Parameters:
        requestResponse - IHttpRequestResponse requestResponse message
        requestInfo - IRequestInfo analyzed request
        parameter - IParameter JOSE parameter
        Returns:
        IAttack instance of attack
        Throws:
        AttackPreparationFailedException - if error occurs during preparation step
